file_content.text: This isn't how I meant it to turn out.
You!
I assume you're here to laugh? To mock my naivete?
You can't have come to kill me. The universe isn't that merciful.
After what you did, you don't think I should kill you?
You betrayed me.
Do I get a vote?
Maybe you shouldn't be asking her opinion?
Did she just ask you to kill her?... I'm confused.
Traitor!
Why are you still speaking with her?
This is a waste of time.
Are you asking her permission?
Go ahead. I'd rather be killed by your hand than his. Or mine.
I ruined everything I worked for, everything I wanted, for the promise of... oh, it doesn't matter.
I thought I'd find you and the Voidwolf arm-in-arm, throwing darts at a map of the Core Worlds.
Dissension in the ranks?
Aren't you on the Voidwolf's side? Is this a... kitchen?
What are you doing here?
This isn't enough humiliation? You want me to spell it out?
Yes! I went to the Voidwolf, and this is where he sent me. Useless, he called me! After everything I did for him....
You're wrong. I'm here to kill you.
You're a dead woman.
Then do it! How can it get any worse? I sacrificed everything, for... for a promise that doesn't matter.
After everything I did for him, he sent me here.
Get me out of here and I will help you destroy him! I want to see the Voidwolf dead! I want to see him begging!
I'm not here to rescue you. Not this time.
I'm not helping you.
I wouldn't ask for that. Just a deal, like any other criminal.
You'll have to pick one.
Dead men don't beg.
You're creative. I'm sure you'll come up with something.
I hope you've got something to offer me.
You want to make a deal?
Make your deals with the Republic.
You're under arrest.
You think they won't negotiate? With everything I know about the Voidwolf?
I know his plans. He's been assembling a massive pirate fleet, completely independent of the Imperial Navy.
He's going to strike our main shipyards. Get me out of here, and I'll give you all my files-- everything.
If you've got something good enough, all the Republic needs to know is you were "killed in the course of escape."
Tell me and I'll let you go.
That's supposed to make up for tricking me into doing his dirty work? For pretending you cared?
What about me?
But I did care. I really did.
I can't offer you mercy, Dodonna. Only the Republic can do that.
No promises.
They're letting you represent them, right? Tell them this deal is worth my freedom.
Of course. You first.
[Lie] I'll help you escape.
Here. The files of all my communications with the Voidwolf. Everything the Republic needs to know.
Whatever you decide, make sure they get this.
Join my crew. We can fight the Voidwolf together.
Come away with me.
Only if you shoot me now!
Men! Would you consider this for one second if she were ugly?
All those nice girls, and this is the one you fall for?
No!
Then I am gone.
Do not think the Voidwolf will let her go so easily.
And I thought you were forgiving with me....
You're better than I deserve, Captain.
But I think I should disappear first. No sense making you even more of a target.
Councillor Caicos is the Voidwolf's man on Corellia. He can tell you where to find him.
I'll be seeing you.
You want to prove you've changed? Go to the Republic and admit your crimes.
Turn yourself in.
I never thought I'd meet a man worth serving time for. Would you do the same for me? Don't answer.
Promise me you'll hunt down the Voidwolf. Go to Councillor Caicos--he's the only one who can get you to his flagship.
Where is he? You give me the Voidwolf, I don't care what happens to you.
Deal.
Councillor Caicos is his man on Corellia. Only he knows the position of the Voidwolf's flagship.
Knowing you, that'll be all you need.
Thanks, Captain.
You need to face justice for your crimes.
Turn yourself in.
Better there than here. I know a lot of judges in the Republic... and not well enough for them to hate me.
Don't let the Voidwolf get away. Go to Councillor Caicos-- only he knows where his flagship is.
Take me in now. I've confessed my crimes.
You chose the Voidwolf. Did you really think I'd let you live?
Now you die. [Kill her]
Better dead than an Imperial slave!
But I'm not the real target. Take down the Voidwolf, for what he did to both of us. Councillor Caicos can get you to his ship.
Now end it. My love.
Now end it. I would do the same.
